products.title: Blomberg SSM4554 Tall Larder Fridge White
products.body_html:
Blomberg SSM4554 54cm Tall Larder Fridge White 

Looking for a spacious and convenient solution to store your chilled goods? Look no further than Blomberg's tall fridge, the SSM4554. With its advanced Auto Defrost technology, this fridge prevents ice build-up on its back walls, saving you valuable time and effort. Say goodbye to the hassle of manual defrosting!  Illuminate your fridge's contents effortlessly with energy-efficient LED lighting. Unlike conventional bulbs, these LEDs are not only brighter but also help reduce energy consumption. With just a glance, you can easily see everything inside your fridge.  

Equipped with a variety of storage options, the Blomberg SSM4554 offers ample space to accommodate your weekly shopping needs. Additionally, it features a convenient chrome rack specifically designed for storing bottles, ensuring they remain secure and easily accessible.

products.title: Beko LSG4545W Tall Larder Fridge White
products.body_html:
Beko LSG4545W Tall Larder Fridge White 

Looking for a new refrigerator? Discover the Beko LSG4545W Tall Larder Fridge! With its impressive features and sleek design, this 54cm-tall fridge in elegant white is the perfect addition to any kitchen decor. Its adjustable shelves offer customization options, allowing you to optimize the interior according to your needs.  

Say goodbye to manual defrosting woes! The Beko LSG4545W comes equipped with auto defrost functionality, saving you time and effort. Plus, the convenient LED light ensures easy access to your late-night snacks without disturbing others' sleep.  

With 5 spacious refrigerator shelves and 4 built-in door bins, this fridge offers ample storage for your groceries. Keep your fruits and vegetables fresh and crisp in the dedicated refrigerator crisper.  

Concerned about fitting the fridge into your kitchen layout? No worries! The reversible doors give you the flexibility to adapt it to your preferred configuration.  Rest easy knowing that this fridge is not only energy-efficient with an "E" rating, but it also holds CE-UKCA certifications, guaranteeing its quality. The straightforward installation guide facilitates hassle-free setup, and its freestanding installation style offers convenience.

products.title: Haier HTW5618EWMP Frost Free Fridge Freezer Dark Inox
products.body_html:
Haier HTW5618EWMP Frost Free Fridge Freezer Dark Inox

Discover the Haier HTW5618EWMP Freestanding Fridge Freezer Frost Free - Dark Inox, equipped with cutting-edge features to revolutionize your kitchen experience.

Unleash the Power of 3D 60 Series 5

At a spacious 60cm width, Haier's Three Doors 60 refrigerators introduce a meticulously engineered freezer drawer system, optimizing space utilization for your frozen essentials. With up to 60% energy savings compared to similar models, enjoy swift access to the entire freezer compartment while preserving energy efficiency. Thanks to Fresher Techs®, your food remains impeccably fresh with automated condition adjustments.

Effortless Access & Enhanced Visibility

Experience innovation beyond convention with Haier's Easy Access drawers, granting swift and convenient entry to your frozen provisions. Enjoy enhanced visibility of your freezer's contents, surpassing traditional hinged doors. Plus, ergonomic design ensures minimal cold air leakage, slashing energy wastage by up to 60%*.

Tailored Temperature Control at Your Fingertips

Introducing MyZone, an ingenious feature allowing precise temperature adjustments from -3°C to +5°C with a single touch. Haier's commitment to innovation ensures your tailored storage conditions, surpass expectations with ease.

Preserve Freshness Twice as Long

With Haier's Humidity Zone drawer, maintain the freshness of your fruits and vegetables for up to two times longer*. Powered by HCS (Humidity Control System) Technology, this compartment sustains optimal moisture levels, preserving nutritional content and minimizing condensation.

Effortless Maintenance with Innovative Technology

Haier's Total No Frost technology revolutionizes maintenance, preventing frost buildup with utmost efficiency. The innovative 'Fresher Shield' safeguards your frozen delights during automatic defrosting, eliminating the hassle of manual defrosting forever.

Seamless Control with Digital Display

Take command of your refrigerator's conditions effortlessly with the sleek digital touch screen, eliminating the need for constant door opening. Independently set fridge and freezer temperatures with a simple touch, ensuring precision control.

E Class Efficiency for Environmental Consciousness

Opt for Haier's E-Class Refrigerators and embrace energy savings, performance enhancement, and environmental stewardship. Enjoy up to 20% less energy consumption compared to F Class models, without compromising on performance.

Flexible Installation with Reversible Doors

Experience ultimate flexibility with Haier's reversible doors, accommodating diverse kitchen layouts effortlessly. Adapt your refrigerator to any space, ensuring seamless integration into your kitchen design.

Illuminate Your Contents with LED Lighting

Brighten up your kitchen with Haier's LED interior lighting, offering enhanced visibility compared to conventional options. Enjoy energy-efficient illumination that's built to last, providing a clear view of your refrigerator and freezer contents.

  • Net Freezer Volume: 125 L

products.title: Hoover HONCQ2T618EWKR Freestanding Frost Free Fridge Freezer White
products.body_html:
Hoover HONCQ2T618EWKR Freestanding Frost Free Fridge Freezer White

Hoover fridge freezer is a premium choice that you won't find anywhere else. With a total net capacity of 341 litres, it offers abundant space to accommodate the entire family's groceries comfortably.

The fridge section provides a wide range of storage options to keep everything organized and easily accessible. It includes two adjustable shelves that can be customized to fit various food items, three door balconies perfect for storing bottles, jars, and dairy products, and an XL salad crisper that’s ideal for those who love to stock up on fresh produce, ensuring fruits and vegetables stay crisp and fresh for longer.

In the freezer section, you’ll find three spacious drawers, providing plenty of room to store frozen foods neatly. The transparent design of the drawers allows you to see the contents at a glance, making it easy to find what you need without having to rummage through.

 

One of the standout features of this model is its Total No Frost technology. This advanced feature prevents ice build-up inside the appliance, which means you’ll never have to spend time defrosting it manually. This not only saves you time but also ensures that your fridge freezer operates efficiently and maintains a consistent temperature, keeping your food in optimal condition.

The HONCQ2T618EWKR combines practicality with innovative technology, making it a perfect addition to any kitchen. Whether you’re storing a week's worth of groceries or prepping for a big family meal, this fridge freezer offers the flexibility and convenience you need.

products.title: Liebherr RE1400N 55cm Undercounter Fridge White
products.body_html:
Liebherr RE1400N 55cm Undercounter Fridge White

Discover the Features of Liebherr Undercounter Fridges

Are you looking for a high-quality under-counter fridge? The Liebherr undercounter fridge offers an exceptional blend of performance, style, and innovative features, designed to meet your cooling needs while enhancing your kitchen space.

SuperCool Technology for Optimal Freshness

With SuperCool technology, your Liebherr fridge ensures the optimal temperature for your groceries. Whether you’re storing food that has been warmed by the sun or just brought in from the market, the SuperCool function boosts the fridge's performance to cool new items quickly. Once your fresh food reaches the ideal temperature, SuperCool automatically turns off, ensuring energy efficiency.

Bright LED Lighting for Better Visibility

Liebherr’s LED side lighting illuminates the entire interior of your undercounter fridge, giving you a clear view of all your stored items. Positioned in front of the glass shelves, the LEDs ensure even a fully stocked refrigerator remains well-lit, making it easier to organize and find what you need.

Effortless Temperature Control with TouchControl

Adjusting the temperature in your Liebherr undercounter fridge is as simple as a gentle touch. The TouchControl panel allows you to set your fridge to 3, 5, 7, or 9°C with ease, offering precision temperature management for optimal food storage. The sleek design of the control panel is integrated into the fridge’s interior, maximizing space.

Ergonomic and Stylish Recessed Grip

The recessed grip feature ensures you can easily open the appliance using its vertically integrated, ergonomic handle. This stylish yet functional design element fits seamlessly into modern, hands-free kitchens, enhancing both convenience and aesthetic appeal.

Durable Worktop for Extra Kitchen Space

Need more room to prepare meals? Liebherr’s under-counter refrigerators come with a durable worktop that extends your kitchen counter. The scratch-resistant surface provides additional space for cooking tasks, making it a practical addition to any busy kitchen.

Stainless Steel Interior for Maximum Hygiene

The stainless steel interior, shelves, and inner doors of the Liebherr undercounter fridge offer a rust-proof, easy-to-clean surface. This ensures maximum hygiene and simplifies the cleaning process, giving you a long-lasting, reliable appliance for your kitchen.

Explore Liebherr's under counter fridges today and bring the perfect blend of technology and design to your kitchen.

products.body_html:
Fridgemaster MTL55242E 55cm Tall Larder Fridge White

Introducing the Fridgemaster MTL55242E Larder Fridge - a spacious and efficient solution for modern homes. With a large 242L capacity, this fridge offers ample space to store all your favourite foods.

The MTL55242E is designed with convenience in mind. It features four adjustable shelves and four door bins, allowing you to customize the storage space to suit your needs. Plus, the salad crisper provides the perfect environment for keeping your fruits and vegetables fresh.

One of the standout features of this model is its Auto Defrost function. This feature ensures that excess water is evaporated, preventing ice build-up and saving valuable space. This means you can make the most of the fridge’s capacity without worrying about defrosting.

But that’s not all. The MTL55242E also comes with a bright LED internal light, making it easy to find what you’re looking for, even in the dark. And with a reversible door, you can open it from either the left or right-hand side, offering flexibility to fit any kitchen layout.

Haier HFR3718ENMD 70cm Total No Frost Fridge Freezer Dark Inox

Upgrade your kitchen with the Haier HFR3718ENMD 70cm Total No Frost Fridge Freezer in Dark Inox, a perfect blend of modern design, spacious capacity, and advanced refrigeration technology. This Haier fridge freezer is ideal for contemporary homes, offering a sleek dark inox finish that complements any kitchen style.

With an impressive 402L net capacity, this fridge freezer provides ample space to store all your groceries. Inside, you'll find two adjustable shelves, three door bins, and a salad crisper to keep fruits and vegetables fresh. The unique MyZone drawer allows you to store meat, fish, and fresh produce at their ideal temperatures, ensuring optimal preservation.

The freezer compartment includes two direct access drawers for easy organization and quick access to frozen foods. Plus, thanks to the Total No Frost technology, you’ll never have to defrost again. The fast freeze function rapidly freezes your items, locking in freshness and nutrients.

If you're searching for a first fridge freezer or upgrading your current refrigerator, the Haier HFR3718ENMD is the perfect solution, combining functionality, efficiency, and style for your kitchen needs.

products.title: Bosch KGN27NLEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Silver
products.body_html:
Bosch KGN27NLEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Silver   

Introducing the Bosch KGN27NLEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Silver, a savvy solution for keeping your food fresh and your kitchen sleek. With its frost-free technology and ample storage, this appliance ensures optimal freshness and convenience.

Maximize Space & Freshness: With a capacious 171L fridge capacity and a dedicated salad crisper drawer, the KGN27NLEAG offers ample room for your groceries while keeping them fresh and tasty. Three shelves provide organized storage for chilled favorites, while the 84L freezer boasts four drawers with clear front panels for easy food monitoring.

Effortless Maintenance: Say goodbye to manual defrosting with the frost-free design of the KGN27NLEAG. This feature not only saves you time but also conserves energy by preventing ice formation and optimizing usable storage space.

Durable & Safe Shelving: Crafted with safety glass, the freezer shelves are sturdy and less prone to breakage compared to standard glass. The smooth surface ensures easy cleanup, making accidental spillages a breeze to wipe away.

Convenient Bottle Storage: Equipped with a chrome wire wine rack, the fridge offers a convenient storage solution for up to five bottles, freeing up space on the shelves for your everyday groceries.

Flexible Layout Options: Thanks to its reversible door hinge, the KGN27NLEAG provides added flexibility in kitchen layout planning. You can position the refrigerator wherever suits your space best, optimizing functionality and aesthetics.

Upgrade your kitchen with the Bosch KGN27NLEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Silver, designed to keep your food fresher for longer while complementing any kitchen style.

products.title: Bosch KGN27NBEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Black
products.body_html:
Bosch KGN27NBEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer Black 
 Looking for a fridge freezer that combines functionality with style? Look no further than the Bosch Series 2 KGN27NBEAG 55cm Black 50/50 Frost Free Fridge Freezer. This appliance boasts numerous features that make it an excellent addition to any home.  Storage Capacity Capacity is a crucial factor to consider when selecting a fridge freezer, and the Bosch Series 2 KGN27NBEAG excels in this regard. With a 50/50 split between the fridge and freezer compartments, it offers ample space for all your groceries.  The fridge compartment has a 171-liter capacity, while the freezer compartment has 84 liters, giving you a total usable capacity of 255 liters. This ensures that you have sufficient space to stock up on all your favorite foods without running out of room.  Frost-Free Technology One of the most impressive features of this fridge freezer is its frost-free technology. This eliminates the need for manual defrosting, which can be a time-consuming and unpleasant task. Instead, the Bosch Series 2 KGN27NBEAG will defrost itself, ensuring that your food stays fresh and your freezer remains clean.  Reversible Doors This fridge freezer also boasts reversible doors, allowing you to select which side the doors open on. This feature can be particularly advantageous if you have limited space or want to create a specific look in your kitchen.  Fashionable and Efficient Lastly, the Bosch Series 2 KGN27NBEAG is an excellent choice for those seeking a fashionable, efficient, and practical fridge freezer. It has all the features you need to keep your food fresh and your kitchen looking fantastic. With its frost-free technology, reversible doors, and generous capacity, it is the perfect addition to any modern kitchen.

products.body_html:
Samsung Series 8 RS68A884CSLEU American Style Fridge Freezer with SpaceMax™ Technology Silver

Feed The Family

Upgrade your kitchen with a spacious and stylish 635-litre fridge. With a large capacity that can hold up to 35 bags of groceries, this fridge is the perfect solution for families and busy households. The flat streamlined doors, recessed handles, and convenient water and ice dispenser make this fridge both practical and stylish. Experience a smarter way of shopping with Samsung's top-of-the-line spacious fridge. Elevate your kitchen with the large capacity refrigerator and enjoy the benefits of its sleek and modern design, perfect for any kitchen upgrade.  

Smart Conversion 

The appliance comes equipped with Twin Cooling technology, providing you with five temperature modes that meet all your needs. Easily convert your freezer into a fridge for additional storage or switch off the fridge and freezer to conserve energy. This America Fridge Freezer offers a solution for all your storage needs.  

Lots Of Room To Organise Your Food 

Discover the spacious fridge section of the RS68A884CB1, located on the right side and featuring four shelves, two large salad crispers, a bottle rack, and five convenient door balconies for easy storage. In addition, the freezer includes three shelves, two deep drawers, and two-door balconies to accommodate all of your frozen food needs.  

Power Cool & Power Freeze 

At the touch of a button, Power Cool blows intensely cold air into the fridge to quickly cool your groceries or favourite drinks. Power Freeze delivers a fast blast of cold air into the freezer. 

Plumbed Water & Ice Dispenser

 Help yourself to chilled filtered water or a jug of ice without having to open the fridge.  

Twin Cooling Plus 

With two separate air flows and precise temperature control, Samsung Twin Cooling Plus™ keeps food fresh for longer. 

Digital Inverter Compressor

Cleverly alters the fridge's power and running speed so the temperature is constantly perfect, making it more efficient, quieter and longer lasting.

Sensis RFUCF01F54EW 54.8cm Freestanding Undercounter Larder Fridge - Compact & Versatile

products.title: Bosch KIN85NSE0G Series 2 Frost Free Integrated Fridge Freezer White
products.body_html:
Bosch KIN85NSE0G Series 2 Frost Free Integrated Fridge Freezer White

Introducing the Bosch KIN85NSE0G Series 2 Frost Free Integrated Fridge Freezer White, designed to revolutionize your kitchen experience with unparalleled features.

Unlock ample space for your fresh foods with the MultiBox XXL. Say goodbye to cramped refrigerators as this innovative feature provides generous room for your produce. Whether you're stocking up on salad greens or chilling a watermelon for a picnic, the MultiBox XXL has you covered.

Bid farewell to tedious manual defrosting tasks with our NoFrost freezer technology. Unlike conventional freezers, our system collects air humidity in a central chiller unit, eliminating the need for manual intervention. Enjoy uninterrupted freshness as NoFrost keeps your freezer ice-free effortlessly.

Maintain optimal freshness with Eco Airflow, ensuring even distribution of humidity and temperature throughout your fridge. Preserve flavors and extend the shelf life of your groceries effortlessly.

Experience peace of mind with our advanced alarm system, alerting you with sound or light when the door isn't securely closed. Keep your fridge items organized and visible with bright LED lighting. With long-lasting, energy-efficient LEDs, every corner of your fridge is illuminated for easy access. Plus, with Home Connect technology, control your LED lights effortlessly via the app.

Reinforced with Safety Glass Shelves, our fridge provides extra stability for heavy items like pans and dishes. Enjoy hassle-free cleaning and storage convenience with these shatterproof shelves.

Upgrade your kitchen today with the Bosch KIN85NSE0G Series 2 Frost Free Integrated Fridge Freezer White, where innovation meets convenience for a superior culinary experience.

products.title: Bosch KGN27NWEAG Series 2 Frost Free Freestanding Fridge Freezer White
products.body_html:
Bosch KGN27NWEAG Series 2 Frost Free Fridge Freezer White

The Bosch KGN27NWEAG Series 2 Fridge Freezer is the ideal solution for families, food enthusiasts, and anyone looking to upgrade their kitchen with a reliable, energy-efficient, and spacious appliance. With its frost-free technology, ample storage, and thoughtful design, this Bosch fridge freezer makes organizing your groceries effortless while maintaining freshness for longer.

Key Features of the Bosch KGN27NWEAG Fridge Freezer

Generous Storage for Groceries

Packing away your weekly shop has never been easier. The 171L fridge compartment offers ample space with three sturdy safety glass shelves and a convenient salad crisper drawer to keep your fruit and vegetables fresher for longer. The 84L freezer features four transparent drawers, making it simple to organize and locate your frozen goods at a glance. Whether it’s family meals or personal snacks, this fridge freezer has all the room you need.

Frost-Free Technology for Hassle-Free Maintenance

Forget the days of manual defrosting. The frost-free design prevents the buildup of ice, saving you time and energy while ensuring a consistent temperature throughout. With no frosty layers obscuring your food, you’ll always have a clear view of what’s inside.

MultiBox Drawer: Prolong Freshness for Fruit & Veg

Love your fresh produce? The MultiBox drawer is perfect for keeping your fruits and vegetables crisp and nutritious. By maintaining a lower humidity level, this compartment helps extend the shelf life of your peppers, lettuce, and other fresh ingredients.

Durable Safety Glass Shelves

Built for everyday use, the fridge’s shelves are crafted from extra-strong safety glass. Even if spills occur, the design contains liquids to prevent mess from spreading across the fridge, making cleanup quick and simple.

Integrated Bottle Rack

The handy bottle rack is perfect for storing wine, soft drinks, or other beverages, freeing up additional space on the shelves for your groceries.

Reversible Door Hinge for Flexible Placement

Whether your kitchen is spacious or compact, the reversible door hinge allows you to adjust the door opening to suit your layout. This flexible design ensures the Bosch KGN27NWEAG fits seamlessly into any home, no matter the setup.

Why Choose the Bosch KGN27NWEAG Series 2?

  • Energy-efficient performance to save on utility bills.
  • Spacious yet compact, perfect for modern kitchens.
  • Reliable German engineering from a trusted brand.

Whether you’re looking to upgrade your kitchen or need a dependable fridge freezer to store your family’s groceries, the Bosch KGN27NWEAG offers unbeatable convenience, style, and performance.

Buy the Bosch KGN27NWEAG Fridge Freezer today and enjoy fresher food, more storage, and a hassle-free kitchen experience!

products.title: Bosch KGN392LBFG Series 4 Freestanding Frost Free Fridge Freezer Stainless Steel
products.body_html:
Bosch KGN392LBFG Series 4 Freestanding Frost Free Fridge Freezer Stainless Steel

Bosch KGN392LBFG Series 4 Fridge Freezer: Ultimate Blend of Style and Functionality

The Bosch KGN392LBFG Series 4 Fridge Freezer perfectly combines modern design with exceptional functionality, tailored for contemporary households. This freestanding appliance, finished in a sleek Inox look, elevates your kitchen aesthetics while delivering top-notch performance through its advanced features.

Spacious and Thoughtful Design

The Bosch KGN392LBFG offers a generous net volume, with 260 litres in the fridge and 103 litres in the freezer, making it ideal for families of all sizes. The fridge is intelligently designed with four glass shelves, two drawers, and four door bins, providing ample space to organize groceries efficiently. The freezer’s three drawers facilitate easy storage and retrieval of frozen items. Bosch’s frost-free technology ensures your food stays fresh longer by eliminating the need for manual defrosting.

Advanced Temperature Control

Equipped with electronic temperature control and an LED display, the Bosch KGN392LBFG allows precise monitoring and adjustment of temperatures. The fridge's adjustable range of 2°C to 8°C and the freezer's -16°C to -24°C cater to diverse storage needs. SuperCooling and SuperFreezing technologies rapidly cool or freeze new items, preserving freshness and nutrients.

Energy Efficiency and Quiet Operation

The Bosch KGN392LBFG stands out with its impressive energy efficiency, boasting a B rating and an annual consumption of just 129 kWh. This eco-friendly performance helps reduce energy bills while maintaining effective operation. Operating at a quiet 33 dB, this fridge freezer is perfect for open-plan living spaces where noise levels matter.

Safety, Durability, and Additional Features

Safety and durability are key priorities for Bosch. This model is flame retardant and features a glossy back wall with multi-airflow to ensure consistent temperatures. The reversible right-hand hinged door provides installation flexibility, and the integrated vertical handle adds to its sleek appearance.

Enhanced user experience comes with additional features like a humidity-controlled vegetable drawer and a VitaFresh XXL Pro 0°C compartment for storing meat and fish. The open door alert, both visual and audible, prevents energy loss and food spoilage.

Customizable and Convenient

The Bosch KGN392LBFG offers height-adjustable shelves, a bottle rack, and an egg tray for a customizable interior layout. The freezer’s 18-hour power failure safe storage capacity ensures your food remains frozen during power outages. Easy installation is ensured with no plumbing required and a 2.26-metre cord length. The appliance’s SN-T climate class allows efficient operation in various ambient temperatures, making it suitable for most kitchen environments.

Conclusion

The Bosch KGN392LBFG Series 4 Fridge Freezer is a premium appliance that merges advanced technology, energy efficiency, and stylish design. Its spacious and flexible storage solutions, along with sophisticated cooling features, make it an excellent choice for enhancing any kitchen. Whether storing fresh produce, meats, or frozen goods, this fridge freezer keeps your food fresh and delicious for longer, making it a valuable investment for any home.

products.title: Bosch KSV36VWEPG Series 4 Freestanding Tall Larder Fridge White
products.body_html:
Bosch KSV36VWEPG Series 4 Freestanding Tall Larder Fridge White

Bosch KSV36VWEPG Series 4 Freestanding Tall Larder Fridge - Freshness and Convenience Redefined

Upgrade your kitchen with the Bosch KSV36VWEPG Series 4 Freestanding Tall Larder Fridge, designed to keep your food fresher for longer while offering innovative features for enhanced convenience. This premium appliance from Bosch is packed with cutting-edge technology and smart storage solutions, making it the perfect addition to any modern home.

Key Features of the Bosch KSV36VWEPG Larder Fridge

VitaFresh: Keep Food Fresher for Longer

The Bosch VitaFresh drawer creates the ideal environment for storing your fresh fruits and vegetables. With adjustable climate controls, you can tailor the conditions to keep produce fresher for longer, reducing food waste and ensuring you always have the freshest ingredients at hand.

LED Lighting: Perfect Illumination

The integrated LED lighting provides bright, energy-efficient illumination throughout the fridge, giving you a clear view of all your stored items. Pair it with the Bosch Home Connect app to control the lighting remotely, adjust brightness, or switch it on and off using your smartphone.

Super Cool Function: Rapid Cooling for Fresh Additions

Adding new groceries to your fridge? The Super Cool function quickly lowers the fridge temperature to maintain optimal cooling, ensuring your existing food stays at the right temperature. Activate this feature easily through the Home Connect app or via voice control for added convenience.

Intelligent Inverter Technology: Energy Efficiency Meets Performance

Equipped with Intelligent Inverter Technology, this fridge continuously adjusts its temperature based on internal and external conditions, ensuring stable cooling and maximum energy efficiency. This smart technology keeps your food fresh while reducing energy consumption.

Easy Access Shelf: Simplify Your Storage

No more struggling to find items buried at the back of the fridge. The Easy Access Shelf, made from shatterproof glass, glides out effortlessly, letting you view and reach all your stored items with ease. It's the ultimate solution for organized storage and quick meal prep.

Why Choose the Bosch KSV36VWEPG Tall Larder Fridge?

  • Spacious Design: Perfect for large households or those who love to stock up on fresh ingredients.
  • Energy Efficiency: Engineered to save energy while delivering outstanding performance.
  • Smart Connectivity: Control features like lighting and cooling remotely with the Bosch Home Connect app.

Order Your Bosch KSV36VWEPG Larder Fridge Today

Invest in freshness, efficiency, and convenience with the Bosch KSV36VWEPG Series 4 Freestanding Tall Larder Fridge. Perfectly suited for any kitchen, this appliance combines innovative features with Bosch's trusted reliability.

The Liebherr undercounter fridge, with a 141L capacity, is the perfect blend of compactness and spaciousness, ideal for smaller kitchens. It features three adjustable Glassline shelves and a salad crisper to keep your fruits and vegetables fresh. Measuring 85cm x 60cm x 60.7cm, this fridge fits seamlessly into any kitchen layout. The RDI1620 model also offers a reversible door, allowing you to choose whether it opens to the left or right, suiting your space and preferences. Additionally, EasyFresh and SuperCool technologies ensure your groceries stay in optimal condition, preserving their freshness for longer.
